TEXT.TITLE: GUINNESS COMPLETES UNIT SALES WORTH 232.6 MLN STG
TEXT.BODY: Guinness Plc <GUIN.L> said it has completed the sale of subsidiaries <Martin CTN Group Plc> and <Drummonds Pharmacy Group Plc>. Total consideration was 232.6 mln stg, subject to adjustment on final audit, which is expected to add 12 mln stg, Guinness said. Martins has been sold to <Panfida Ltd> an Australian investment company, and Drummonds to <Macarthy Plc>. Reuter
